verses.verse: For this <S%G5484>cause<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>,

<S%G1489>If<s%> you have heard <S%G191>of<s%> the <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>:

How <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> he made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%>; <S%G2531>(as<s%> I wrote <S%G4270>before<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> few <S%G3641>words<s%>,

By <S%G3739>which<s%>, <S%G4314>when<s%> you <S%G314>read<s%>, you <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4907>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>)

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1074>ages<s%> <S%G1107>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> it <S%G601>is<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G3588>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>;

<S%G3588>That<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4789>fellowheirs<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the same <S%G4954>body<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4830>partakers<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

Of <S%G3739>which<s%> I was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> the effectual <S%G1753>working<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>.

Unto <S%G1698>me<s%>, who <S%G3588>is<s%> less than the <S%G1647>least<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G1325>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%>, that I should <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> the <S%G421>unsearchable<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G5461>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G5461>see<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the beginning of the <S%G165>world<s%> has been <S%G613>hid<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

To the intent <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> unto the <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places might be <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> the <S%G4182>manifold<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>,

According <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G165>eternal<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>purposed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>:

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I <S%G154>desire<s%> that you <S%G1573>faint<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

For this <S%G5484>cause<s%> I <S%G2578>bow<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1119>knees<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>,
<S%G1537>Of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3965>family<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G3687>named<s%>,

<S%G2443>That<s%> he would <S%G1325>grant<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, to be <S%G2901>strengthened<s%> with <S%G1411>might<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2080>inner<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>;

<S%G3588>That<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G2730>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>; that <S%G4492>you<s%>, being rooted <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2311>grounded<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>,

May be <S%G1840>able<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2638>comprehend<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G4114>breadth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3372>length<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G899>depth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5311>height<s%>;

<S%G5037>And<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5235>passes<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you might be <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G1519>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> unto him <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G5228>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> exceedingly <S%G4057>abundantly<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3539>think<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>,

Unto <S%G846>him<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1074>ages<s%>, <S%G165>world<s%> without <S%G165>end<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
